azurerm_data_factory_pipeline.description: Manages a Pipeline inside a Azure Data Factory.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Data Factory Pipeline. Changing this forces a new resource to be created. Must be globally unique. See the [Microsoft documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/data-factory/naming-rules

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which to create the Data Factory Pipeline. Changing this forces a new resource

data_factory_name.description: The Data Factory name in which to associate the Pipeline with. Changing this forces a new resource.

description.description: The description for the Data Factory Pipeline.

annotations.description: List of tags that can be used for describing the Data Factory Pipeline.

parameters.description: A map of parameters to associate with the Data Factory Pipeline.

variables.description: A map of variables to associate with the Data Factory Pipeline.

id.description: The ID of the Data Factory Pipeline.

create.description: Used when creating the Data Factory Pipeline.

update.description: Used when updating the Data Factory Pipeline.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Data Factory Pipeline.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Data Factory Pipeline.
